p.d: Daughter's Sydney show was a revelation that left fans swooning and critics raving. With the crowd hanging on every word of their debut album 'If You Leave', the London trio (singer Elena Tonra, guitarist Igor Haefeli and drummer Remi Aguilella) invoked a beautifully haunting performance that featured heart-rending indie hits like 'Youth' and 'Human' plus their sultry cover of Daft Punk's 'Get Lucky'. Performed at The Metro Theatre, in Sydney, Australia, on July 24, 2013.
